channel.title: Finances on WETHOD / Learning Center
channel.description: Recent content in Finances on WETHOD / Learning Center

item.title: Finance
item.description: Overview Orders In this section you can view all your orders and create new ones. Once you click on the “Send” button, an e-mail is sent to the address inserted in the Email Bot section. You can create orders only for projects you have already provided with job order and budget. Order’s value must be lower or equal then the external costs entered in the budget. Invoices In this section you can view all your invoices and create new ones.
